title: Is google going to fix the issue with the delayed notifications ?
content:
Hi, 

I have been using my pixel 2 XL since it came out. I'm very happy with it. Great phone. 

But since now couple of weeks / months i'm having a serious issue with the notifications. Once you don't touch your phone for couple of minutes you don't receive them anymore. 

It's really frustrating as I have missed several important calls and also some notifications from instagram/gmail etc. 

After some search online, i saw that i'm not the only one and a lot of people are facing the same issue. 

Is Google going to fix this problem please ? Because it's really annoying. 

Thank you,
